mainly.translation[0].definitions[0].def: used to mention the main part or cause of something, the main reason for something etc
mainly.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Her illness was caused mainly by stress.
The workforce is mainly made up of women.
I don’t go out much, mainly because I have to look after the kids.
Increased sales during the summer were mainly due to tourism.
We talked about various things – work, mainly.
mainly.translation[0].definitions[0].not: You usually use mainly in the middle of a sentence
People go there mainly because of the beautiful beaches
You also use mainly at the end of a sentence, especially in conversation
It is much less commonly used at the beginning of a sentence
